title: ID Help! Koto Bolofo La Maison Font for Hermes
content:
Hi,

I was hoping someone might be able to help me identify whether this font is custom or if there is a font available similar to this Koto Bolofo La Maison for Hermes font.

Love the pointed ends and low lines on the A's

http://www.steidlville.com/books/971-La-Maison.html

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150301193333im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bolofo_5754.jpg)
author: baileyr

comments.content: amazing thanks! what a great site
